column1: Every morning, Sarah wakes up at 5 a.m. to go for a run, aiming to complete a marathon by the end of the year.
Jake decides to skip his college classes most days, satisfied with just barely passing his courses.
After ten years of working as a junior associate, Laura finally achieves her goal of becoming a partner at her law firm.
Despite several rejections, Alex continues to send out his manuscript to publishers, dreaming of seeing his novel on the bestseller list.
You’ve just finished a successful presentation at work, which could lead to a significant promotion next quarter.
Collin spends his evenings binge-watching TV shows and never really engages in any extracurricular activities or long-term projects.
I’ve set my sights on learning a new language and practicing with online tutors four times a week.
Maria volunteers at local shelters on weekends and is working towards starting her own non-profit organization to aid homeless youth.
Rob’s weekends are filled with long hours playing video games, with no particular aspirations beyond winning a few online tournaments.
Emily took extra courses in biochemistry, aiming to get into a prestigious medical school and eventually specialize in neurosurgery.
My goal by the end of this month is to finally declutter my apartment and donate all the items I no longer need to charity.
Nick dreams of becoming a professional photographer and spends every free moment taking pictures and learning new techniques.
Your colleague has been in the same administrative assistant role for over five years, showing no interest in applying for any advancement opportunities.
Ben devotes every evening to improving his coding skills and is working on an innovative app he hopes to launch next year.
Jane always wanted to open a bakery, and now she’s spending her weekends experimenting with new recipes to perfect them.
Chris is content working part-time at a bookstore, without any plans for further education or career advancement.
I’m aiming to save enough money in the next five years to travel around the world and experience different cultures.
Tina keeps a vision board in her room filled with pictures and quotes that inspire her to pursue her dream of becoming an actress.
Despite having sufficient talent, George never attempts to excel in music competitions and prefers to remain in the background.
We’ve set up a small garden in our backyard and are tending to it daily, hoping to grow enough vegetables to donate to the local food bank.
